title: ZBT #70: Lions, Eagles and Gorillas, Oh My!
description:
Cons is in Mexico so Chaps, RadioBren and Kate are left to their own devices. After a quick chat about the NFL turning down an AMVETS Super Bowl ad about kneeling, they break down a survival hypothetical: Pick 2 animals to defend you from an army of other animals. Cons reads a first person account of WW2 hero Lou Zamperini!Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/ZeroBlog30
